title: The Cartographer of Echoes
tagline: In a Paris of rain and ghosts, a man who maps forgotten pasts must guide a scholar haunted by a city that never was.

chapters.title: The Fabric of What Might Have Been
A New Layer on the Map

story: Write a chapter where Silvain and Émile encounter a 'living echo'—a person or creature formed entirely from a potent, collective memory of a place that was almost real.
Create a journal entry from a long-dead Luminaire cartographer, describing the moment they first successfully mapped a 'mythopoetic layer' and the personal cost it incurred.
Draft a scene set in the 'unwritten city' of white stone from Émile's dreams, from the perspective of the woman in the green dress waiting by the fountain.
Write a monologue for Madame Thérèse explaining her backstory: how a simple *libraire* became a dealer in narratives and a gatekeeper for those touched by echoes.
technical: Build an interactive 'Echo Map' visualization where users can explore different 'mythopoetic layers' of Paris, with each layer representing a potent but unrealized past (e.g., a Paris that remained Roman, a Paris built entirely of crystal, etc.).

Design a generative text tool that simulates 'echo leakage': it takes a seed description of a real place and gradually infuses it with elements from a user-defined 'potential past,' blending the two narratives.

cover_prompt: A man in a worn 18th-century coat meticulously traces glowing, spectral lines in the air, his fingers pulling luminous city plans from the mist, while beside him a scholar stares in awe and terror at a shimmering, impossible Parisian spire materializing from the rain, [in a grand, rain-slicked Parisian square at night where the cobblestones reflect not lamplight, but half-formed memories and ghostly architecture], [in the atmospheric style of a synthesis between the luminous romanticism of Caspar David Friedrich and the detailed, mysterious urban realism of Edward Hopper, with the ethereal texture of a faded engraving], [book cover framing, a centered and intimate composition viewed from a low, dramatic angle that emphasizes the soaring, emerging spectral city against the real one], [dramatic chiaroscuro lighting with a single source of warm gaslight cutting through the cool, volumetric rain and the ghostly blue-white bioluminescence of the memories, palette of deep Prussian blue, charcoal grey, sepia, and ethereal gold], masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, intricate details, professional composition, sharp focus, 8k resolution, flux dev
